lead_paragraph: Each time Marc Mariani heads out to catch a kickoff, he huddles first with the Tennessee special teams coach for a quick strategy session. Once he reaches the end zone and the ball's in the air, the mental calculations begin.

headline.print_headline: NFL HALFWAY: Rule Change Boosts Strategy on Kickoffs Returns
headline.main: NFL HALFWAY: Rule Change Boosts Strategy on Kickoffs Returns
